# The `BufferFatPtrToIntTypeMap` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Remap ptr addrspace(7) to i160 and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; to vector&lt;Nxi60&gt; in order to correctly handling loading/storing these values from memory. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class anonymous_namespace{AMDGPULowerBufferFatPointers.cpp}::BufferFatPtrToIntTypeMap</CodeBlock>

Recursively replace instances of ptr addrspace(7) and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; with some other type as defined by the relevant subclass. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtypeloweringbase/#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Remap ptr addrspace(7) to i160 and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; to vector&lt;Nxi60&gt; in order to correctly handling loading/storing these values from memory.
